Interface UndirectedGraph

All Known Implementing Classes:
IncidenceArrayGraph
public interface UndirectedGraph
Represents an undirected graph.

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(Edge e) throws GraphException, GraphOverflowException
      Adds an edge to the graph.
      Parameters:
      e - the edge to add
      Throws:
      GraphException - if the edge cannot be added
      GraphOverflowException - if the graph is full

      Gets the edge connecting two vertices.
      Parameters:
      v1 - the first vertex
      v2 - the second vertex
      Returns:
      the edge connecting the vertices
      Throws:
      GraphException - if the edge does not exist
